definition[0]: a powder that is used to add a hot taste to food
definition[1]: a hollow red, green, or yellow vegetable, eaten either raw or cooked with other food
definition[2]: if something is peppered with things, it has a lot of those things in it or on it
example[1]: a speech peppered with amusing stories
example[2]: The surface of the Moon is peppered with craters.
explanation[0]: Pepper is usually passive in this meaning
definition[3]: if bullets pepper something, they hit it several times
example[3]: Machine gun fire peppered the front of the building.
